keyMappings:
map w removeTab
map a createTab
map r reload
map s focusInput
map t LinkHints.activateMode
map m scrollToTop
map n previousTab
map o nextTab
map e scrollPageDown
map i scrollPageUp
map K scrollToBottom
map N goBack
map E scrollDown
map I scrollUp
map O goForward
map d Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map D Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
searchEngines:
c: http://caniuse.com/#search=%s caniuse
g: https://github.com/search?q=%s&ref=opensearch Github
n: https://www.npmjs.com/search?q=%s NPM
s: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s Stack Overflow
t: https://translate.google.cn/?sl=auto&tl=en&text=%s&op=translate Translate
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
z: https://b-ok.cc/s/?q=%s Z-Library
i: https://search.bilibili.com/all?keyword=%s 哔哩哔哩
